name: coco bread
author: mookman288
description: Popular to serve on its own with cheese, or with a nice Jamaican curry. Use coconut milk instead of milk for a more authentic experience!
recipe: Warm &$0 and combine with &$1 and &$2 and let stand for 10 minutes.
When &$2 has bloomed, add &$3, &$4, and &$5 and mix with a dough hook for 6 minutes until smooth, soft, and uniform
Let dough rest, covered for 1 hour until doubled
Cut dough into 10 equal portions, and roll each portion into a ball
Using a rolling pin, roll each dough ball into a circle, approximately 0.25 inch thick
Transfer to a baking pan and brush each circle with &$6 and fold into a semi-circle
Bake at 425F for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown
